creator: vikashkumar@tracesoftware.in
text:
Created attachment 33670
3 users are being used

My Application allows only one user to login/perform any operation once at a time but jmeter is able to do the same process/request multiple times without throwing any error. I've used record and play function of Jmeter and it is able to do the same request multiple times without throwing any error. I have used multiple users in my thread group that's why it is doing same request multiple time but this should be shown in red or fail as my application support that one user can be used only once to perform  any operation.

creator: vikashkumar@tracesoftware.in
text:
Created attachment 33671
3 times same user data are used

text:

If you have any appropriate link/ place where i can raise this concern please let me know.
